entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:13 PM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023
